page.title: 10FRASER OF STRACHANS MONDAY
page.content: In the morning{I get up at 7 o'clock. I go downstairs to breakfast in my pyjamas.I have{Rice Crispies and an {egg with milk}to drink.After breakfast I go and wash my face and clean my teeth.Then I get dressed.At 9 o'clock {I go to school}which starts at 9.20. I {play football}before we start.We do {maths}and{english}until break at 11 am At break I play football.After break we have{music with a visiting teacher. At half past we have our lunch.I had an{apple ,a yogurt,a biscuit and a {drink.}After lunch we{wrote stories about Jack and the Beanstalk.I went home at 3.30 p.m. When I got home I had my{tea.}I had{mince pie}and then {ice cream.}Afterwards we{watched T.V. and I went to{bed at 8 o'clock.
